**We're expanding to more locations and more nodes!**

**To kick it off here's an offer thats juicy!**

**Limited offer $10 / Year**

**KVM Virtualization (No User End Control Panel)**

+ 256MB RAM
+ 50GB RAID 10 Storage
+ 1Gbps Port (Unmetered)
+ Centos 6
+ DDoS Protection (CNservers) 40Gbps
+ Location (Seattle, WA)
+ 1 IPV4
+ 2 CPU Cores

**Please note: If your application uses UDP, during a DDoS Attack UDP Ports will seal, This behavior is normal for CNservers**

No Seedboxes are allowed, or anything that violates our TOS [here.](http://nexhost.net/acceptable-use-policy-aup/)
